languages.text: "Потеряли вашу печать, шерин. Потеряли и пытались то скрыть — от меня и от вас".

traits.locale_text: "Потеряли вашу печать, шерин. Потеряли и пытались то скрыть — от меня и от вас".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "They lost your seal, shereen. They lost it and tried to hide the fact from both me and you."
languages.original_text: "Потеряли вашу печать, шерин. Потеряли и пытались то скрыть — от меня и от вас".

traits.locale_text: "They lost your signet, shereen. They lost it and tried to hide the fact from both me and you."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They lost your signet, shereen. They lost it and tried to hide the fact from both me and you."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They lost your signet, shereen. They lost it and tried to hide the fact from both me and you."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They lost your signet, shereen. They lost it and tried to hide the fact from both me and you."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They lost your seal, shereen. They lost it and tried to hide the fact from both me and you."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They lost your seal, shereen. They lost it and tried to hide the fact from both me and you."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Ils ont perdu votre sceau, shereen, et ils ont tenté de nous le cacher à {mf|tous|toutes} les deux. »
languages.original_text: "They lost your seal, shereen. They lost it and tried to hide the fact from both me and you."

traits.locale_text: « Ils ont perdu votre chevalière, shereen, et ils ont tenté de nous le cacher à {mf|tous|toutes} les deux. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “他们把你的印章弄丢了，亲爱的。他们弄丢了印章，还打算向你我隐瞒真相。”
languages.original_text: "They lost your seal, shereen. They lost it and tried to hide the fact from both me and you."

traits.locale_text: “他们把你的印章弄丢了，亲爱的。他们弄丢了印章，还打算向你我隐瞒真相。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Sie haben Euer Siegel verloren, Shereen. Sie haben ihn verloren und das sowohl vor mir als auch für Euch zu verbergen versucht."
languages.original_text: "They lost your seal, shereen. They lost it and tried to hide the fact from both me and you."

traits.locale_text: "Sie haben Euren Siegelring verloren, Shereen. Sie haben ihn verloren und das sowohl vor mir als auch für Euch zu verbergen versucht."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Han perdido su sello, shereen. Y, además, han intentado ocultarnos este hecho tanto a usted como a mí».
languages.original_text: "They lost your seal, shereen. They lost it and tried to hide the fact from both me and you."

traits.locale_text: «Han perdido su sello, shereen. Y, además, han intentado ocultarnos este hecho tanto a usted como a mí».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「彼らは、あなたの印章を失くしたのよ、シェリーン。その事実を、私とあなたの両方に隠そうとしていた」
languages.original_text: "They lost your seal, shereen. They lost it and tried to hide the fact from both me and you."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは、あなたの印章を失くしたのよ、シャリーン。その事実を、私とあなたの両方に隠そうとしていた」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Mührünü kaybetmişler şirinim. Hem kaybetmişler hem de bunu senden ve benden saklamaya çalışmışlar."
languages.original_text: "They lost your seal, shereen. They lost it and tried to hide the fact from both me and you."

traits.locale_text: "Mührünü kaybetmişler şirinim. Hem kaybetmişler hem de bunu senden ve benden saklamaya çalışmışlar."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
